testcase.name: Student Admission
testcase.system-out: Given a user is on the login page "https://mexil.it/chroma_tech_academy/dev/site/login".passed When user logs in with valid credentials username "general@teacher.com" and password "123456".passed And navigates to Student Information Module.................................passed And navigates to Student Admission Submodule................................passed Then user is directed to Student Admission page with the text "Student Admission".passed And enters Student unique Admission Number "12345"..........................passed And selects Class "SDET" and Section "".....................................passed
